events.name: Player Controls, Combined Sticking and Separation

events.comment: Make Top Player stick to bottom player
Make sure players stays in frame
Uses Player Object Variables for controls. Players on Top cannot move.
Create AlertRadius that follows each EnemyGrunt
Create Top and Bottom Colliders that follow each player
Label Players with "Top" and "Bottom" upon collision
Openning MultiDoors - Check if All MultiButtons of the same colour as MultiDoor are pressed

parameters: Players.VariableString(Name)+" died in the hands of "+Enemies.VariableString(Name)
